title: Hong Kong Shoppers Watch A Pig Fly â€” Or, Rather, Fall From Above
teaser: A wild boar got into the ceiling of a clothing store in Hong Kong. As the boar kicked a hole in that ceiling, the excited crowd below looked on as the ceiling appeared to give birth to a boar.
